Class EstimationGrid

  • java.lang.Object
    • beetle_kit.EstimationGrid

  • public class EstimationGrid
extends java.lang.Object
    Chemistry Passport Project The grid data for the Estimation Game
    Version:
    April 30, 2015
    Author:
    Charlotte Dye, Humaira Orchee, and Sehr Sethi

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canDrawTree(Tree tree)
      Returns whether we can draw this tree (i.e., it wouldn't create too much overlap or result in hidden trees)
      void fillTreeArray()
      Creates trees in all the cells (blocked and unblocked) and puts them in an array list of trees
      int getCellHeight()
      Returns the height of each cell
      int getCellWidth()
      Returns the width of each cell
      GridCell[][] getGridCells()
      Returns the cell data array

      Get the color of infested trees
      static java.awt.Color getNonInfestedColor()
      Get the color of non-infested trees

      Returns the total number of infested trees in the grid
      int getTotalNonInfested()
      Returns the total number of non-infested trees in the grid
      int getTotalUnblockedInfested()
      Returns the total number of infested trees in the unblocked cells of the grid
      int getTotalUnblockedNonInfested()
      Returns the total number of non-infested trees in the unblocked cells of the grid
      java.util.ArrayList<Tree> getTrees()
      Returns the array list of trees
